title: The year on the water , wildlife , energy , climate and public lands beat
description: It was a chaotic year on the water, wildlife, energy, climate and public lands beat, and 2026 is expected to bring more news regarding data centers, grizzly bears and wild weather.
content:
## There for Montanans year after year.
